lines.text: Hell hath frozen over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Placing Trinket over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! He's crying! I'm crying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys start dodging between the alleyways, making your way towards the north side of Emon, alongside the ruined interior of the Cloudtop District, you instinctually begin to-- and I'd say-- who else has proficiency in perception?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys all start noticing there are what looks initially like flocks of birds moving through the sky. Some of them are heading down into parts of the town in the distance. As you continue to push forward, one set of four in particular start heading overhead. You look up and you can see a small cluster of about five or six flying creatures. Not dragon-sized, by any means, but either a very, very large bird or something of that degree. You can't make out the details, as right now as the sun's beginning to set, a lot of it's dark against a red-orange sky. You keep yourself at bay, waiting for them to pass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, waiting for them to pass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you guys want to do something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a dragon-favored enemy, could I guesstimate what those winged creatures are that would hang out around dragons?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you determine if they're wyverns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wivverns. However you want to pronounce it. Both work in my world. It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pronounced 'jif'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will fight you. But yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're diving into the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a few that dove into city and stayed there. And one group goes overhead, and continues onward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing forward, deeper into the city, you make your way through the Temple District, and start pushing through Abdar's Promenade once again, retracing your steps from the day before, dodging through open areas as fast as possible to stay within the shadows. All of you go darting into one of the alleyways. As you turn behind you, you can see your tiny-legged gnomish bard friend, keeping up as best as he can before his foot hitting a divot on the ground and (slam) falling face first on the ground, making just enough noise--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screech) And coming up on the rooftop, you can see, perched up there, appears to be one wyvern that is looking over down at the currently toppled gnome, and on top of the wyvern, you see something riding it. Something that is holding reins on the edge, something humanoid is glancing over, just a little enough of a shadow, to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He sees me? I see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at you, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will cast Hold Person on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what he is, but I want him to stop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Scanlan's the only one-- we all see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all barely see it looking over the edge as Scanlan's there, left in the middle of the main walkway. That is going to be a natural 17 on the will save. That'll be an 18. What's your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's 17, but the hand-cone makes it 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah-ha!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think I had the wherewithal to use it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With having you fallen on your face, I'd say probably not. Since it wasn't specified, that would be a DC of 17. So the creature seems to rear back for a second, shake its head, and you get a little bit of a look at the features at this point, too. And it is humanoid, but you can see its outer body is not fleshy, or smooth, it is scaled and bumpy. You can see ridges across the back of the head, and in one of the hands, looks like some sort of a spear. Immediately as it rears back, it puts its head up and goes (guttural gibberish).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, riding on the back of the wyvern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are the things that attacked the airship!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Possibly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you should turn it into a bunny, Keyleth! Turn it into a bunny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus Christ. I can do that today. Just rolled shitty on my initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not too good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) This is the music that plays when we fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so! Scanlan, as you were running across the thoroughfare, you tripped and fell that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you had come into this alley over here. Currently, looking over the top of this rooftop, is this wyvern and its rider.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that the rider is like (derpy noise).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (imitates derpy noise) It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go home, rider, you're drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be-- 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. All right, 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, let's see. Vex. 15 to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yikes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight! No, seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uno!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, six, thanks for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you would be-- actually, technically, Keyleth, is next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was so crushing, to see the number on the die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, sorry buddy. It happens to the best of us. All righty. So. Currently with this guy up on top of the rooftop, Percy, you are first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quick question, is he in flight, or is he just sitting on the rooftop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just sitting on the roof, perched on the edge. You can't even actually see him, everyone else who's near the front can see, the few that made the check. You've got a little bit of movement up there, but you're just out of view with the building-- you're right in an alleyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no easy way up onto the roof, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be my whole movement, too, wouldn't it, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most likely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nah, let's see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And how high is the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's about anywhere from 16 to 20 feet tall. It's two-story, but it's not extremely well-built.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to get a vantage point where I can at least get where he's only three-quarters cover. So I suppose I'm going to head south down the alley to see if I can get a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing to these guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so one-- You can get to about there if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can get a good look at him there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, yeah. He'll have half-cover from there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Half-cover's fine. So, if I were to knock him prone, would he fall off the roof, or could I try and push him off the roof? These are my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the wyvern, or for the rider?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your call. What do you want to try?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try knocking him prone, and see if that does it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try and knock him prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. So I'm going to use Bad News, because that's funnier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So (whoosh) you whip out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a shot. That's a 28 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's a wing shot, so you have to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Against 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is the wing or leg shot, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wing or leg shot. I'm sorry, that's a-- Actually, I'm sorry, I have the new sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, new sheet on that one. Updated that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength saving throw. Sorry, strength saving throw against 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's a natural 19 plus four for strength, so that's a 23 on the save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Motherfucker, but he'll still take some damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still takes damage though, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take another shot at him, too, because eff that. I was not quite prepared for this. 2d12 plus six, four, eight, 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage, nice. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to take a-- reload, take another shot and try and knock him off the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. The same shot?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same shot. Ugh. That's a three, so that means I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misfire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Clank!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, first shot of Bad News, (explosion noise) echoes, the sound of the blast rippling through the nearby alleyways, the blast hits the wyvern in part of its arm, sending a spray of blood as it shrieks in pain. As you can see its rider is moved to the side, and you see a second head behind the rider from the reaction of movement. Looks like there's actually two of these creatures riding on the back of this creature. As you go to reload, bring Bad News up again to fire a second time, you pull the trigger and there's a (thump) sound, and you can see now a stream of smoke pouring out the back of the gun itself, and you're a little worried what this is going to do if you don't fix it soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look down the barrel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that'll work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can use my-- I actually can't do-- Am I going to panic and try and fix this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next turn? That's your movement, that's your three attacks, do you have a bonus? Anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can-- I'm going to, I'm going to throw an action surge and see if I can fix this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Go ahead and make your tinker check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! Yeah, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be the rest of your action. Okay, finishes Percy's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to hold my turn until it gets off the roof and maybe comes down to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay, good to know. Let's see here. It appears that my-- Taliesin, could you do me a favor and hand me that box next to the fridge there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. All right, so Grog, as you're doing that, the blasting sound of Bad News that echoed through, you all of a sudden start hearing other shrieks in the distance, like a call to arms of a number of other entities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you see a multitude of other winged creatures begin to arise in the distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shouldn't have gotten him that box, should I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was that in the box?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we could always run, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are we from the tunnel system? Far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's one on this roof here. Each one of them with their own riders, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put them there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For clarification, does this count as turns, or are they, since they're coming late to the party, or this is just them in position?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is them now entering the fray.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they into the initiative order, just gameplay talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, this is the initiative I rolled for them after being called by the guy who was already shouting out into the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, right, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't see them before, given your perspective. These guys leap off over here-- over there. Okay. So we have, first the wyvern that swooped down on you, Percy, is going to go ahead and make an attack with its bite and an attack with its stinger as a multiattack. So that first strike, that is going to be a-- The bite, 13?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stinger, however, is a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my Amulet of the Shield and up my AC for that attack to 23, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So that will miss. So that uses the Amulet. Good to know. So the stinger goes to strike you after the bite misses, and as you grasp your chest, you can see now an arcane barrier shines in front of you and completely ricochets the stinger out into the air to the side as it reacts angrily. The other giant humanoid lizard creature that's coming towards you with a giant heavy club is going to attempt to slam you with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's so many things!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twice. Well, it's going to attack you with its club, that's going to be a 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then it's going to try and slam you with a spike shield. That is 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that guy starts swinging at you loosely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sword out. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Attacking you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's on the ground there. All right. So it has two attacks against you with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be a 24 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the spike shield is going to be a 24 again, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you're on the ground, it slams you with a shield for 12 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't I bring Trinket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! What's wrong with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shield slams you for eight points of piercing damage. So a total of 20 points of damage as (whack) slams you into the ground twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought this was a stealthing mission!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was until he rolled a 15 stealth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blame me, blame me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guys are just assisting the scenario here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy shot at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's one fellow over here that is a bit far away who steps off. Instead of holding the same clubs and shields or other various hack weapons, he's carrying a gnarled staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps forward and sees the weapon that you fired twice and had been fixing, this large metallic dangerous entity, looks forward and begins hissing under his breath (hissing gibberish).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to release my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say make a perception check, actually, to see if you see this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are currently--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually, I will say you do see this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will release my Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume he's casting something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or has a terrible cold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will-- I will sing at him, (singing) And you still haven't hit what you're aiming for!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I think Grog was before me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right, Grog, you're holding your action first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Can I barrel down through the alley now that someone's on the ground, and race towards the one that's nearest Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say sure. Usually, going forward, if you hold your action, that's just your action, not your movement, you still move to the situation, but I'll let it stand for this, it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll remember that going forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you're going to tear down to this guy there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I would like-- and I would like to swing twice with Craven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Still maintaining your bonuses from last game, by the way. You haven't taken a short rest yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes indeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so strong from the last game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus-- That's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a 14 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit. This is the Great Weapon Master?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, these are regular attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't rage yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Oh! No, I did not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to rage as part of your bonus action to this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Figures. All right, so as your bonus action you go into a rage before you strike. Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12-- 22? Oh, wait. Yep, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 damage. All right. The second strike missed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right. 22, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it fails its save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a strength point off of it and add that to what you have now. What's your strength currently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it goes up another plus one to attack and damage. If it became 22, it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, that ends your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anywhere I can stand that I get a good cone shape? Or am I all blocked in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to move through. You might get an attack of opportunity from the guy that's attacking Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, how high is the roof next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 16, 20 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I acrobatics that shit up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try to. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Parkour!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on. Oh! 31?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you look over and see the rooftop up there. You leap off each side, Ninja Gaiden-style. Hop onto the rooftop with a solid view of the entire battlefield before you, including the one flying creature up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Then I'm going to Hunter's Mark the magic user.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to Conjure Barrage in a cone to get as many of those fucks as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it's a 60-foot cone. Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Sorry, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will hit Scanlan, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, balls! I'm a little man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll 3d8 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 3d8 damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not that much. 16, and then an extra d6 on that guy. An extra six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so does he make his save? He does not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to make a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm on the ground. That's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fail, and a success. So 16. The wyvern makes that, so half that for eight. He fails. All right, cool. Got it. So as you go forward, leaping up on top, you mark the one guy, turn around, and release a torrent of arrows that sprays into the center of this open pathway of the city. I believe that ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Balls. Shit. I'm on the ground. If I stand up, that's my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't get to hit me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not unless you move away from him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Which riders are still on their beasts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These two are the only two that are still on their beasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will ignore the guy next to me and I will Hand Cone it up, and I will-- he's got two riders?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they have these ramshackle-- you can see now with a closer look, these leather kind of saddles? But they're mostly thrown leathers that are strapped to its back, and there's two of them holding onto these knobs in front to stay on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two riders?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll Dominate one of them. The main guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Dominate the beast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not a person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Dominate Person and Dominate Monster. They're two different things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to dominate the guy in front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maverick, not Hollywood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Maverick and Goose!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, at the end, it was Hollywood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it was Merlin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Merlin?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Tim Robbins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hollywood was the guy who was his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to do this with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the first conversation I've ever been in in this group where I feel young.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rider's screeching down while it's holding on, and all of a sudden it shakes its head for a minute and looks down at you, eyes connected, and you know that this entity is waiting for its command.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I only give it one command per turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can give it a basic command and it will follow it through, unless you wanted to directly control it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've got two things to do. He's got to get rid of that fucker on his back, and also other things. Let's go for the big kahuna. I command him to ride his beast to attack the one below him. The wyvern below him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, good to know. And do you want to stay where you are? Do you want to move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't want to move because he'll hit me. That would be bad. Who hasn't gone? You haven't gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax hasn't gone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax hasn't gone? Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. because he rolled a one, remember?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yup!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will say: This is ground control to Major Vax, you've really made the blade. And the papers want to know whose blood you spilled!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, take your d10 inspiration die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: d10. Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rest in peace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's Scanlan's turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog is right against a wyvern, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is against a lizard-like creature--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so not against a wyvern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That's a little bit away. But Percy is next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so Percy is right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Scanlan's next to the magic user, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The magic user's over here, that's been Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan's up against a dude, right? All right, so what I want to do is slink up behind Percy, reach over-- oh, no, I want to click my Boots of Haste, is what I want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you use them during the battle against the looters?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't remember him doing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I didn't. No I didn't, I definitely didn't, because I remember kicking myself for-- I definitely didn't. Okay so, click, everybody starts moving slower around me. I want to-- so Percy's against the wyvern, I want to reach over Percy's shoulder and stab the wyvern, and then I want to throw another dagger at the dude standing next to Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this side there, you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I can't tell, I can't see shit-- is that over Percy's shoulder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because right now you're being blocked, you can't quite get to the wyvern unless you move around the building that you left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stab the wyvern in the butt, and then I'm going to throw a dagger from my other hand at the guy standing next to Scanlan-- I've got a question for you. Because both of them have somebody who's running interference, do I get sneak attack damage on both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only get one sneak attack damage per turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just per turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once per turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So I'm going to use sneak attack damage on the wyvern if I get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it! So first strike against it, as you (whoosh) whip around the side of the building, blades out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then for the dude by Scanlan gets a-- word, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. If you have both blades out, you get a third attack too, don't forget.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do. Oh-- yes. So the third stab will go back at the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So the sneak attack against the wyvern, first strike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 14, 17, 22, 23, 25, 27, 29 into the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then the jerk over by Scanlan gets seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then the wyvern takes another, the Keen Dagger, takes another nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, as you rush around, you stab the wyvern on the back of its haunches and you see it shrieks in pain (screeches), looks over its shoulder and starts biting its tail, its stinger swinging about, but you avoid it, fling the other dagger to the side and then jam the other side of its haunches with your other hand. It's definitely aware of your presence now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I use up all my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Knowing that it can swat at me, I'm going to try to go right back around where I came from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm wearing the Cloak of Displacement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's going to swing at you with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just call it cloak number seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses you. (whoosh) Its stinger swings out towards you and you duck underneath, it slams to the side of the building, breaking part of the wood, you can see splinters fly out to the middle of the road. That ends your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. How far away am I from this guy, like-- roughly how many feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guy who's in the air, flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say about 60, 65 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful. I want to move up and around-- here-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back a little bit-- scoot back. Is that still in your path?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's my guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's your--? Oh. Well, I'm not going to fuck with him. I'm going to-- you Dominated the guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I Dominated the guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I turn the wyvern into something else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I Polymorph him? Yeah, I guess he's Dom-- you are Dominating that guy. Is there anything else that's flying? He's the only one that's up in the air left, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all the other wyverns have landed and let their riders off on the sides.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you commanded him to attack the one below you, right? I'm going to turn that wyvern into a-- chicken!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the save on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poof! He has to make a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a seven!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that-- (laughs) The wyvern-- (laughs) Twice now--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) This is my favourite game, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bane of wyverns everyone-- (swoop, chicken noise). As both the riders tumble off, slamming into the ground (sound of impact). That would be-- Okay, ten points of damage to the wyvern, which kills the chicken form entirely. It turns back to a wyvern on the ground, taking the excess three damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah-- (laughs) Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I keep hold of my guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The riders fall also, they both take an additional 14 points of damage to each of them from the fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They all took damage-- and they're on the ground now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see if it takes damage and makes a new saving throw against the spell. Does not make it, so it is still Dominated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Thank God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't fuck it up this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they are all-- all three of them are considered prone for now. They are all knocked prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ends Keyleth's turn. At the top, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Where am I, I can't see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here, you're blocked in between the two buildings, the mouth of the alleyway, with a wyvern and lizard creature right there, standing before you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. And how would you describe-- these are like scaly people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This up close and personal, they are humanoid in build, they have, you know, stand up upright, they have long tails, ridges across the head, they're bigger than an actual human and they're very muscular, and the more you look at it, you can see that their clothing, they have tattered cloth and leathers that have been haphazardly dyed in blood and gore to all be a very, very deep red color. And they're pretty uniform across what they are wearing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're an army.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Team colors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tough call, tough call. You know what, I'll have a little fun. I'm going to pull my sword and I'm going to take a slash at the guy who's involved with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit, I forgot to use my bonus action. Can I pop in a quick bonus before that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hex him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already hexed today. You used it in the battle versus the looters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Same day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, just add to this, would he be described in anywhere on his little D&D card as something with a dragon keyword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm just going to do normal damage to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wyverns, however--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, just checking. I'm going to do nine points of damage, slashing damage, to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to turn to the wyvern, and take two slashes at the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First is-- ew. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're sacks of hit points, but they don't have lot of armor to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 19 plus-- 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And second shot-- 13, 24, yeah, that hits. Ten, 17, 18, 19, 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 twice in a row. So with this you pull the sword out, as soon as you see it in the proximity of the wyvern, the blade itself almost seems to shimmer with this gleam of green on it, like the metal almost seems to bend and wave with your movements. And as you turn back around to slash at the wyvern, the blade cuts through it like butter, there's not even resistance, it goes right through its flesh. With each slash of the longsword, you can see large chunks of its muscle coming visible as parts of its body are now being pulled from the muscle and sinew. It shrieks in pain, you can see it angrily now starting to get ready to rake at you pretty heavily. That end your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to continue where I started on, shitfucker out in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I would like to go Great Weapon Master and I would like to use Reckless Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, wow. Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your first attack against him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? He fails his save, so you get another plus one to your strength, and that swing just cleaves it in two. It goes (whoosh) right through its midsection, it (gurgles). It tumbles off, falling to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog is full juicing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I told you he'd open up to me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move in now with your movement and do your next attack, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go ahead and take care of that wyvern that's next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, all right, so now you get your next attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does his strength go up to 100 eventually?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's double your first dice roll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19-- oh, so the 2d6 was nine, plus five is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 29, plus two additional die rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So we're at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then one more? Because you roll 2d-- it's twice, because of Brutal Critical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, you got like Tetsuo arm, it's like five times bigger than it should be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four. Four for those two, do I plus five to that as well for the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, plus ten for your-- you already added that for your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, 2d6 plus five on each one and the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just the additional 2d6 each time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, with that you turn around after hacking its friend, leaping forward (grunts), foam at the corner of your mouth, your eyes bloodshot and angry. You take the blade and sweep it down, and it plunges itself right into the wound that Percy had left open with his sword swing, finding no resistance before it comes all the way to the hilt in the body of the wyvern, which shrieks for a moment (screeches) before its breath stops and its body falls limp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, one down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does make its save, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, and on Great Weapon Master on a crit or killing an extra hit, but I guess I--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action! For the record, going forward, if you're frenzied raging it doesn't really give you a benefit, but if you're not, it does help. So in theory, you could if you wanted to try and chuck it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Just throw it? Don't throw it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you want to give it another kind of a thought, if you see it land?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get on the wyvern and kill the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a-- 17, it hits! That's going to be 11 points of damage, does it make its save? It does not make its save, that's an additional 24 points of poison damage on that one. So that's 35 points of damage, one wyvern to another. (laughs) As this guy immediately whips around angrily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of these guys go charging forward here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to pull up its javelin and chuck it at you, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That is going to miss you at a 12. It (swoosh) throws, the javelin arcs past you. This one over here is going to come forward and it's going to take a javelin as well out and chuck it right at you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heh, you're dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 20 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of piercing damage, reduced to five, as you basically (impact)--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (snapping noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Snap it off and grin in its face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me return that favor in a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog is on god mode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Save game plus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) --now it sees the danger that you're in, looks at you, sees you hack through the center of one of the wyverns, intensely looks at you and begins casting another spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like it is wont to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, smart Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, Craven Edge, as you're holding it, all of a sudden the handle becomes white hot and you immediately take six points of fire damage just holding it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grip it harder! (groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fire's biting through. Three attacks against you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy is-- 18. That hits. And then this guy here without the advantage-- still hits with a 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cutting Words on the last guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to just-- (plays flute badly) to distract him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll a d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d10. Which one's ten, I never remember. This one. Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So he rolled a 17 plus seven, that would've been a 24, that brings him to 15, which I believe misses you. So the last strike, as he swings towards you, the shrilling tones, it causes him to reach up and grab one of his lizard-like ear holes and (snarling) the swing goes wildly over your head. However, as you duck down, you look up as you see the shadow come down of two large clubs that (boom boom) over the head of your tiny gnomish form. That's going to be-- (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not a good sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take 12, which would double to 24-- Oh, no, sorry, 12-- 20 points of bludgeoning damage from one. You take 12 points of damage from the other. So 32 points of damage total. And they're both going to attempt to bite you as well, with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bite with advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 20 on the first one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the damage it does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's to hit. And that one's going to -- double 19, so they both hit. So you take another 20 points of damage total of piercing damage as they both start tearing into your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 52 points of damage just then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (rasping breath)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Scanlan!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you're still up, you're still up! I thought you said you had 55!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was 52 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have three points left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! That was close, guys. I saw my mother! Then I saw myself at math class, failing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a bunch of concentration checks here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To maintain control over it, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage on concentration checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so just roll two at a time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two whats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two d20s.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I only have one d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adding your constitution modifier to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many-- oh, for each thing that-- constitution modifier. Holy God. Okay. I'm counting both of those, the first one's only 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, that'll work, because none of them-- only one of them did 20 damage and it's minimum of ten, so as long as you get above a ten with each one, you're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I got to do two more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's 16 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on these.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven plus two. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No good. No bueno.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you lose your concentration on the Domination spell. As that fades--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. The other wyvern is still mad at the first one, so that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends their turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Scanlan being tossed around on the ground, and then you see streaks of blood in the air as one of them tears a big chunk out of his shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks up at you briefly, his eyes half-open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! I got you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, I know you did. You shot me on the last turn, I remember. Yeah, you got me good! You got me good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot from my Bow of the Sky Sentinel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sky Sentinel, I believe, did you use that last battle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, but I only used my burning thingy once, so I can do that. Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay. So I'm going to move my Hunter's Mark to one of the guys around Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you want to say the most wounded of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the least wounded of them, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The least wounded would be this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And then I'm going to shoot-- I'm going to shoot arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to shoot through my Blazing Bowstring on that guy and the guy in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Right there and there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Blazing Bowstring, and then regular. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I forget how to do that. I roll to attack. Why is this so hard?! Okay, 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to roll damage on that one, which is ten plus my normal eight. 12, 14 plus six for Hunter's Mark. 20 plus six for sneak attack, bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you just call the DM a bitch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I was calling that guy a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt does not deserve that kind of language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 6d6. So that's 25 damage against the first guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 damage? That's just enough. Say goodbye to him. That sneak attack was just what you needed, that was the last bit of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Okay, so the second guy is another 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another 18? That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 14, 15, 16. Do I get sneak attack on him, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can only sneak attack once per turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dang it. So 16 damage against that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn? You going to stay up there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call. That brings us to Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my turn?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take a potion! Heal yourself!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! If I had a potion, that would be great! I will do Thunderwave-- Thunderwave at third level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave at third level, all righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dissention in the ranks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay, so that is 4d8 thunder damage to all the ones on a failed save. So, their constitution saves here. Is this through a hand cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Figured-- both fail!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it, 4d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 4d8 thunder damage. They are pushed ten feet away from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they all fail? Did they both fail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. This pushed this way. This pushed that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten. 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage to each. Okay! They're blasted backward, barely catching themselves on their feet. And from the impact, you can see what little bit of red-colored leather armor they have on is tattered and destroyed. You can see blood pouring out of the sides of their earholes where the thunderous blast possibly burst their eardrums. And they're both like, shaking their head. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, I will Healing Word myself--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do that at higher levels? Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do it at a level four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So that is 4d4 plus five healing to yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 4d4 plus five-- That's 14 plus five.19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. So you heal yourself 19 hit points. That ends your turn. Up next, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scramble up to the top of the building that I'm right next to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. No problem. Yeah, way high. 20-- 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You parkour up the side, land on top of the rooftop. Leap across and you're now at the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that Percy right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Percy right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh, who's right directly in a row, away from me? Yeah, I can't tell. It's a bad guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bad guy, bad guy. Bad guy, bad guy, bad guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, exactly. That is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run and stab.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One square back. Right there! Grab him. And I'm using my bonus action to dash and then drag him backward, behind Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to grapple someone who would be against it, are you letting him grapple you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hell yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the sake of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, two actions and a bonus action, mix them around, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine, because he wants to. You rush forward, you grab him, and you're dragging him back this way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (airplane noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say that's about as far as you get because you have a bit of movement taken away, even though you are hasted, because he's not too heavy, but he's still a gnome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. Dash-- hasted, I can go very very far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your hands are so rough and masculine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spank him on the ass and say, you're welcome, shorty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to push my way through the crowd a little bit. Can I have that laser pointer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Okay. (grandiose voice) And now with all of the rage, thinking about all--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I turn someone into a chicken."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I-- boof! Boof! Boof! I want some feather-down pillows for our loft. I channel all of my Fire Ashari ancestors. And I cast my 7th-level Firestorm!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god, we're all going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So as I concentrate, enraged at the sight of dragons, I have ten--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Did you get me away from-- because I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly, I'm going to start here and I'll work my way over. They're ten-foot-- remember, they're ten-foot. But they're attached. So they're bigger than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three-- well, they're ten foot by ten foot, which is about this size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it's one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay, yeah, get the wyvern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get all of them there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that guy is going to be so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog's going to bite his head off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have to make a dex saving throw or they take--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right, but what's your DC on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, my spell DC? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 7d10 fire damage to each of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you use that all the time!?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just got it! I just got it when I leveled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to be careful with friendly fire, and we're all out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So a giant, fiery chasm splits open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ground bursts open, rocks being torn asunder as giant columns of flame-- boof, boof, boof, boof, boof-- out of the ground, completely engulfing each one of them in this sudden conflagration of red and orange and yellow flames and molten magma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (clapping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Phew. Gingers, man. Gingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My hands light up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each one of the lizardfolk-type creatures in the flames, you see them shriek for a second before their forms are turned to ash in these blasts of fire, each sub-woofer-like, guttural impact as the ground cracks open like (explosion noise) scatter amongst--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they explode? Popcorn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, each one of the wyverns themselves, you can see the flames emerge around them, and as it recedes they have burn scars and their flesh is cracked and peeled against the fire wounds that now tear across the front of their body. They're all looking fairly hurt by that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm-- exhausted a little bit, little single tear as I think of my ancestors-- And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, end of your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to start walking towards that wyvern at the bottom there-- Yeah, that way, I'm not going to get quite close enough to get into the reach of that jerk over there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can go here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. While I'm walking by him, though, I'm going to nail-- I don't even know if I'm really going to-- going to shoot him three times while I'm walking by, because that's funny. With Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So first shot against them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be seven, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. Go ahead and roll damage on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion noise, pained squawk) And you can see the lower jaw gets blown off and it falls to the back on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since I've got two more shots, I'm going to start shooting at that one dragon-- that wyvern, as I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Go for it. Two shots on the wyvern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pew!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a nine, yay! So that's 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thankfully will not-- that's great. 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. This one (explosion noise) the bullet hits inside of its body, you can see a little (splurting noise) of blood squirt out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'll get as close as I can get to him in this round, also, I'm going to spend my movement walking straight towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy walking noises) That's the rest of it there. Okay. That's your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Yeah! I leave one of those to you guys, and I run at the two wyverns on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Getting in the middle of the fray? Against them both?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, against them both!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go! Grog charges, and they're both-- There you go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's hoping these puppies go-- That's 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 on the more wounded one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I swing at the other guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's divvy it up, I don't want to give anybody too much love. Five, four, 26?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, so roll damage on each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both Great Weapon Master? Okay, 32 damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 32 on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one, you carve through him with the blade (whump).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Makes his save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leave a large wound across the front of its jaw and it (choking noise). However, you did kill one, so you do get to use your bonus action for an attack because of your Great Weapon Master feat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have to roll for the hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 31?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the minus five?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry! No, no, never mind, sorry, what's 31 minus five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, yeah, you're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Three, seven, 12, 30. Oh, 22, 32.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's covered in ichor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32. This time (whoosh) you swipe through the second time with the blade, this time carving off part of its wing, and you see that one of the wings is half-curled and keeping up to the side, it's hobbling around its legs, looking like it's on death's door, but still keeping itself. All right, is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And natural 20 on the stinger, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have resistance against poison, so that helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does help, actually, so it'll just do regular poison damage against you. So you take 11 points of piercing damage, reduced to six from the bite. And the stinger deals-- That's 12 points of piercing damage, reduced to six as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stinger, however, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Ugh, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure. Actually, it would have been an additional 12, because it was a critical hit on the pierce, so you take 12-- so a total of 18 damage so far, and then, as part of the poison, you take 48 points of poison damage. Because you have resistance, that is reduced to 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! That's nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one coming up against you, Percy, strikes with its bite. That is going to be a 20-- 16?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses. That is going to be a 22 for the stinger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stinger hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, stinger hits you for six plus four, ten points of piercing damage. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, you succeed. No poison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I took ten points of--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Piercing damage. Correct. All right, it's looking rough on both their ends. They're just fighting to the end at this point. All right, that ends their turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on the one fighting--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving it over?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to first attack the one fighting Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16-- does hit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't have a whole lot of armor. They just got a lot of hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus sneak attack-- 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. So Grog, as you're thrashing about with the blade at this creature, eager to get that final hit, you reach back with Craven Edge before an arrow (impact) into its face and it (burble, thump) collapses to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I shift my attention over to the one fighting Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that is 30, no, 28?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits, go ahead and roll damage with the extra d6 for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine, ten, 11-- Where's my dex? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurt it, but didn't leave it in any dire straits yet. That ends your turn, are you staying where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm staying where I am!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to jump off the roof and rush over to Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So leaping off, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24-- Scanlan, at the start of your turn, as you're getting ready, all of a sudden (impact) in front of you, spooking you momentarily, you see Vex lands on her feet and looks down at you with a look of concern and wanting to make sure you're okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so I'll-- I can't do much, because I'm far away and I don't want to kill Percy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to live through me anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. I will Wand of Magic Missiles him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, using how many--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use six of my seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oof! All righty. So go ahead and roll proper damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, the first, okay, so is that 6d4 plus one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be Magic Missile, cast at level six, technically, I'm pretty sure--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's weird, because my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it would be-- it would be 6d6 plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 6d6 plus six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. 6d4 plus six. Bleah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles) Heh, math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, it's close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Okay. The missiles (impact noises) slamming into the side, arcing off and swirling around Percy to hit it, anime-missile-streak style, hitting it from all sides, you can see chunks of its body being blown off from the force of the arcane casting. It still stands, though it is dripping from multiple wounds and is having a hard time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so, I mean, I'm okay. I'll heal myself a little bit more with another level one Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, take your d4 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Seven more points-- yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start walking towards it and dagger, and dagger, and dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, we get--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Sneak Attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten for the fir-- Sneak Attack? Is it near something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy is in melee range with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the first is ten plus-- wah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, dice down!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten plus 16, 23, (growling) 29, 36, 39, 41 for the first dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will aim for its open mouth as it's going "huah." And pin its tongue into the back of its skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wet coughs) It begins trying to cough, and as it does, you can see bits of blood and gore from its throat being hawked across the ground. It takes a few steps. Percy steps out of the way as it heads towards you before it rears back and (choking, thump) and collapses onto the ground. You can see the blade still sticking out the back of its head, towards the back of its throat, before it appears at the side of your belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry I made a noise, guys, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Next time, stealth. We should get inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should hide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should-- we should take what we can and we should also hide the bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's bring everything inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go down to the wyverns and I start going for those stingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you can do this quickly, Keyleth, because we need to hide these bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take you a while to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I assist with my Keen Dagger, and help her under her instruction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get them inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to drag the wyverns indoors?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Drag everything indoors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait-- these stingers are on the end of tails?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, can you chop off their tails and we'll take the tails with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we've got to get the wyverns inside. If anything flying overhead sees these bodies, they know something's been attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't half of them burned to a crisp anyway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not crisped, just scorched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's some ash. I go ahead and I do a cantrip, Gust, and start spreading out the ash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It still looks like someone emptied a bunch of fireplace ash pits into the center of the walkway where there once were lizardfolk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll have the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the Dust of Tracelessness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I give us cover. I'll blow my Horn of Fog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start putting the Dust of Tracelessness down on the ground so it looks like nobody's been here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Low fog sound as Scanlan blows the horn. Fog fills the vicinity and you guys begin tossing Dust of Tracelessness around--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go grab the humanoid figures and I throw two over my shoulders and then I get one in each hand and I start dragging them toward a door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any-- inside. Just inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To an "any inside."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll get the door for you. (door creaks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys pretty quickly manage to move what you can out of the way, we'll say over the next few minutes the fog is there. Under that cover, you begin to drag the wyvern bodies into the alleyway, into the shadows. If you want to go ahead and make some checks here to go ahead and see if you can harvest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so first one, I'll definitely take advantage, so, since I have advantage-- not that much better-- 14. The first one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would it help if I gave her my Keen Dagger for the rest of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first one, it's been a little too damaged in battle and you aren't able to really draw any poison from the stinger for the first one-- what's the second one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one, 15 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15's what you needed. You manage to extract just enough of the wyvern stinger poison for possibly a single dose, so you can mark down a dose of wyvern poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll give it to-- I'll give that to Vax. Do you have poison? Or do you-- Vax or Vex-- I give it to one of the twins. Here, twins. You fight over it. Fight over it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it good for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two more, maybe I can-- 14-- Okay, well, the second one I rolled a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's a second dose of wyvern poison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I give to Vex. Last one-- I'll take that 15, with-- 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you have three doses of wyvern poison that you've managed to harvest from these creatures; you guys can distribute as you see fit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything else to loot from these schmuckuses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jumping back in-- As the party re-gathers themselves after the battle with these lizardfolk and the wyverns in the center of the city of Emon, you slowly make your way back through the streets towards the north, passing through Abdar's Promenade, finding the building that was previously brought to your attention thanks to Garthok.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we take a short rest, though, before we head down to the Clasp? Because some of us have taken some hits--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take a breath in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Before we head down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. In the basement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys find the building that was brought to your attention; you head down into the same cellar, keeping tabs on the external trap that was brought to your attention by Garthok last time. You make your way inside. There's the same barrel in the far corner; you pull the top off and there, indeed, is a ladder that leads down underground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, search that shit, Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's very claustrophobic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we've just got ladder down. That's it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on, let's heal up. I need to hit dice it up as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm fine, so while everybody is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would not like to take a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I lose all my Fancy Feast if I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just do some push-ups. Just do some push-ups while I check this ladder out. So I'm going to check for any traps on this ladder or anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah yeah yeah! Can she heal me instead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll heal you. I'm going to heal you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking at the barrel, there are no traps currently set, and it's not locked. The only traps were on the outside of the cellar, from what you knew previously, and as that mechanism had already been shown to you by Garthok, so that was easily disabled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to go crazy, I'm just going to go to the bottom of the ladder-- in I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So while you guys are taking a rest--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 for stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop down the ladder. As you head down what probably comes to about 15, 20 or so feet into pitch black-- it's completely dark down there. Do you have any light source, or do you want to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a Flame Tongue Dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It puts out a very, very low candlelight, opens up the vicinity to you as your feet splash down into very, very shallow, a couple inches, shallow water. Looking around you, you are in a subterranean sewer system. The smell hits you as you hit the bottom of it. This is the entire underbelly of Emon, and there is the slight sound of trickling water that's rushing through this tunnel you're currently standing in. The ladder drops close to about a foot above the floor before it comes to a complete stop. Looking to your right, it descends a little further down on that side, and you can hear-- make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. To the right of you, what should be the eastern tunnel, you can hear the sound of trickling water growing louder; it's almost like this stream meets another. As you listen to the left, and the stench is pretty rough in this part, to the left you can see in the tunnel is a very, very faint dim, yellow light that is shifting ever so slightly in the distance as it curves around out of view. It is level to where you are now, actually, slight incline for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) Vex'ahlia-- There is a long tunnel down here and there is a bit of faint light. I have Percy's fancy rock; I am not planning on doing anything crazy, but I think I should--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have the-- the rock doesn't work until we sleep. You don't have anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Regardless, I should go ahead and, if there's anyone to talk to, I should talk-- I'm not going to go yet, I'm going to wait 'til you guys have rested, and come down to-- it's pitch-black down here, I'm not running ahead. I'm better at this shit than you and the rest are, so take a rest, I'm going to sit here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're better at talking than the rest of us are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sometimes, Stubby, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How will I know if you get into trouble, and your hands are tied--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stubby, could you come down here for me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on just a moment. Mind the gap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You splash down into the sewer system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eugh, fuck, it smells down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to step in the water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably. Come here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right so, before all these guys-- you were being stalked by someone, I don't know for what reason, I don't know who the person was, I don't know what they wanted with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stalked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Clasp was going to get you for them, and I stopped that from happening. I followed you one night, or rather, followed this person following you, and met the Clasp. And I made an exchange for your life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I went and got someone else. And--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And said it was me? No--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not immediately. You're almost on it. They told me to get a body, I got a body. A living body. A child rapist. And brought him to the Clasp, and they brought out a stick-- really it was made of human tongues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A stick. Of human tongues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. They touched it, and he turned into you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they took that guy. For whatever. And in exchange for your life, I have this, and they are allowed to call on me when they want. So, I know that we've run in and out a couple of times, but we're going in. You can talk my fucking ear off in a moment, all right? Just shut up for a second.
