We are going to go in and try to form some sort of alliance or working partnership, this is different than running in, smashing some shit and running out, all right? So keep the cloak up, hang back, don't say a lot, and you can talk my ear off later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I will do that, I want to know that tongue guy, that looks like me-- is he dead or is he alive now? They gave him to some stalker, some stalker!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know why you were wanted, I don't know what it was about, all I knew is that they were going to take you away and I wasn't going to let that happen and I took some fucking piece of shit and traded him in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there could be at this moment in time another person that looks just like me parading around the world?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if I had to wager on it, I'd say that he's in a dungeon in a rubber suit, but I don't know where, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, thank you. For, you know, doing that-- (nervous laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never told you because it's creepy as fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it the Clasp here, was it the Clasp in Westruun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was in Westruun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, these guys probably don't know me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably? Probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll put my hood up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay at the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. For everything. thank you. You always have my back and I know it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And for that, I won't say very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do you, Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone can come down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you finish your short rest, you all progressively find your way down the ladder and to the subterranean sewer system. The choice is to travel to the east or western side of the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sounds like there's, I don't know, drainage or something coming from slightly up in that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm guessing towards the light, is where they are. Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have something that can make disguises? Don't you have like, not the mustache, but something that can really change my looks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know I'm Scanlan? I could be in disguise, but yes I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I use that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would have to attune it to yourself-- is that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it takes like a little bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no no no, requires attunement. What do you think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's not a bad idea, but it means we've got to sit in this stank.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or just me. How about just me? I've got a question, though. Here's the thing: if you think that they know what I look like, don't you think they know what you look like? Because you look just like me. So what difference does it make if I'm there or not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's parading you around in front of the people who made an illicit deal with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right, all right. Seeming, how about that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could be fine. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! Seeming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (smarmily) It's pretty high-level stuff--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, what if I heal you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if I-- ooh! I cast Minor Illusion and give her a moustache. What about that? Is that pretty good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A fancy, fancy moustache that you cannot wipe off your face!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, that's very handsome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not quite enough for our purposes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I dispel it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about a limerick as payment, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A limerick for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! You're going to give me a limerick?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll give you a limerick. Hold on. I've been preparing it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's multiclassing a third time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter, cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was excellent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second firestorm of the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the extinguisher?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will give you a d6 inspiration dice for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait-- me or her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. That's impressive. Here's the hat. You can use it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thanks, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In about 20 minutes you'll be able to use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off my circlet, I guess, and I put on the hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How 'bout that smell, everyone? Eh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you live in this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never lived--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you deal with this!? Oh, oh, that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the time it takes for you to take the Hat of Disguise and go ahead and attune to that, you guys are now prepared. What path would you like to take?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards the sounds, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have the sound of water rushing to the right, in the darkness, and you have the sound, or, yeah, the view of slight moving light to the left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But did you say, on the right, is it going down, or is it coming down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water is trickling downward; the water continues sloping downward this way. The opposite direction is where the light is. The little bit of light you see in the distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we follow the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Follow the water down or follow the light?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, what the fuck are we doing here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like the Underdark again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I abstain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go towards--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards the light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do whatever they say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going towards the light or towards the rushing water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Light.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All who vote "light," say "aye."

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All who vote "water," say "aye."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys head-- left, or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any Thieves' Cant on the walls at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, yes, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any poo on the floor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he doesn't need my help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking along the walls, you start heading in that direction, you do see a few markings that basically say 'sanctuary' in Thieves' Cant, in the direction of the light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Confirmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue onward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll lead the way. Yeah, we sat here for 20 minutes in the stank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, glancing over here, as you're first looking, and you can see a few of them appear to be laid up and hurt, and there appear to be at least a few individuals that are heavily bandaged or have slings on. As you guys step into the room, not being very stealthy in your arrival--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could have been, but I use a bit of sign language from the Cant, and let them know that I'm part of the Clasp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A few of them stand up, hands on the side of their hilt, and stop there for a second before one individual steps out of the shadows and puts his hand up, putting it down. You recognize this to be Garthok.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garthok!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says, "Don't worry, they're with me. I'm glad you made it. It had been a while. I was "afraid maybe you wouldn't come."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got held up by some wyverns. I almost died, it was crazy. We're here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It sounds like it. I'm sorry to hear it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm glad you stayed alive." And as he starts to talk, the group of individuals standing about ten feet behind him separate as another figure pushes past them. Pulling the hood back, you can see a man about six feet in height, average human height, long, blond hair that trails past the middle of his back over a dark grey cloak. Fine features at one time; he looks older, you can see the weathering in his face and the various wrinkles and lines from years and years of living in this atmosphere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said "human", right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Human, yes. He has a red-tinted monocle over one eye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! I like him already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pushes aside Garthok to the rest of you and says: "So, you are the ones called Vox Machina, am "I correct in this assumption?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm! Trusted of Uriel, executors of Modeth the Traitor. One among you is a member as well, "I'm told."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I step forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you are welcome here. I am Spireling Shenn--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Spireling Shenn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (murmurs) He's a Spireling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Master of networks and information--"

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "--of the Clasp of Emon. Excuse the mess, we lost a portion of our territory and are currently "caught in mid-adaptation. So, what can I do for you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know who we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you know who I am, now."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. And you know my spotty track record with the Clasp. But that's all past now. The city's in ruins. You're looking at the right hand of Uriel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uriel is no longer with us. You are a hand to nothing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course. We're looking for what to do next with this city. I don't think any of us wish to be the pets of the beast that's now roosting in the heart of Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "No, that does not do any of us any good. Business has ground to a halt, and we've "lost a few good patrons in this unfortunate circumstance. We lost our entire northern tunnel "structure as soon as the creature attacked the Cloudtop District."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'll be honest, our first thought was to flee this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Safer."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But before we make that decision-- yes, it is-- we know that you're the next best thing to a government in Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we want to know what's left behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're seeing to our own. We're going to see how many of our allies still lie within the "city. Going to reach out to our friends across Tal'Dorei and see how much of a network we still "stand to keep. Then we call in a few debts, reach out to some friends and, ah, we see if we can find "some way to supplant this red thing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not good. No. Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine, you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine. The plan now is to lay low and hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The piles of wealth are growing, and it looks like "the beast is building a damn home out of the district."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The city's going to need a black market.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And these creatures have continued eastward ever since-- no further word on their whereabouts. So "we're put in a reactionary position, which I

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, here's where we could help each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would appear that could be a possibility."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need this city to stay alive. We need the citizenry to be fed, and we need people to know where they're going to get their medicine and when they're going to get their food. We understand it's going to be tricky. We need information, we need spies, we need to know what's happening in the city, and you need people like us to stay out of your way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That seems like a fairly top-heavy trade in our direction, if you ask me. There are many ways "to get people out of our way."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are ways that we can benefit each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would love to hear it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) I would, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have safe haven-- and please, by the way, stop me if you feel I'm being too broad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have our keep that is untouched by the dragon's attack-- we have a safe haven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. How is this keep accessed?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can get to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are-- options.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also have strong connections to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And to The Slayer's Take-- that's what they're called, right? Yes? There could be a formidable force that could come to protect the city or drive out the dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're proposing a short-term solution-- you want to get back to a position where you can grease the wheels and make money. That's not going to happen anytime soon. But you can't take care of these beasts on your own. And neither can Whitestone, neither can we.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it is very likely that we will be the thing that is dropped upon it from a great height, and the most cooperation we can get, getting into a position of power over this beast, the happier we'll all be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Let's say we do this, let's say we go forward with this alliance. You get out of our "way, you promise resources from Whitestone, perhaps? They have quite a few unique "contributions they could make. The Slayer's Take-- I have not had many dealings across the Ozmit Sea, "but are you referring to, ah, Vasselheim?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Indeed. They are a mighty force.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, that is a tough nut to crack, that city. If you're connected in Vasselheim, perhaps "we can talk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no guarantees you'll be able to get in anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's no guarantees we'll be able to provide food or medicine-- it's dangerous times, "my dear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is. But the sooner these dragons are defeated, the sooner business can get back to usual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow. I mean-- (fake coughs) eh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know I'm getting a bit ahead of ourselves, but once the dragons are gone and the city's returned to normalcy, what is your ultimate goal? To hold power or to remain in the underbelly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All the real power lies in the underbelly, my friend. I have a proposition for you, then. We "will do this. We have many channels and secret tunnels throughout the city, and we could very "easily deliver food, medicine, shelter, even, to the wired and poor and downtrodden folk of this "town, be the subterranean heroes of Emon. Out of the goodness of our hearts, of course. However, "once this creature is toppled, and the city is brought toward, I gather you would have the ear "of whoever comes to power in this city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may very well be the person that comes to power in this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is helpful. And I imagine you also have some presumably powerful connections in "Vasselheim. We would be interested in beginning a sect of our fair trade in that distant, all-too-- "how do I put it? Xenophobic cityscape?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you agree to be our seed in that stubborn garden of a town, you have our aid."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you give us a moment? (softly) Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My patience grows thin."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Can we talk about this for a second, guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He adjusts the monocle on his eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we really need them? Are they really providing us with enough to make this worth our while, to where we essentially want to open up the Pandora's Box of crime in Vasselheim? Do we want to be responsible for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm all about Pandora and her box, but I don't think we really need this. It's not worth all of that. Especially if we're going to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we just took one pretty top-heavy deal and traded it for an even more top-heavy deal not in our favor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, I'm not-- I feel the urge to further discuss this. Also, to be fair, we're not representatives of the Clasp; we couldn't, technically speaking, open-- All we can do is-- I think, the most fair thing to do-- to offer in exchange for this is perhaps some trade with the materials that are available in Whitestone and maybe a promise of keeping a blind eye towards their business until the finished reconstruction of the city. Let them reestablish themselves until the city is properly completed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need an underbelly. Underbellies are function. Underbellies function for this very need: the fact that we can actually get food and medical supplies into the city right now if we need to. Less than 72 hours after such a devastating attack, there's no other system--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If the Clasp were to vanish, something else would take its place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're inevitable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't want to introduce them to Vasselheim, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the cost of people starving or not starving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're already here, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm down for joining them and letting them join our cause, and using their infrastructure, but beyond that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use perception to make sure that we're really private right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I join in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22-- Oh, 22, plus can I use my inspiration on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When'd you get that inspiration die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got it in the wyvern fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would've faded by now, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33? You're far away from the crowd. However, Spireling Shenn has been very concentrated in shifting his attention from each person that is currently speaking in this conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's reading our lips.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn my back to him and I say, he can read our lips as well as I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course he can, which is why I'm not saying anything that I wouldn't want him to hear anyway. I just don't want to promise anything we can't deliver. I don't think we could deliver Vasselheim; we're going to be busy! We have too much on our plate as it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think they'd listen to us anyway, honestly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to offer what we can give, and see if that's enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to have something to sweeten the pot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you offering, money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Offering to sweeten the pot-- we're defeating a fucking dragon! Let them get back to normal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't promise that! The dragon could very easily kill us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could say-- They certainly can't do it without us. And we can't do it without them. But we'll be bringing in other armies with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree-- it's joined forces at this point, that's all we can offer them. A place to fight at our side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're still assuming he's going to keep his word, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me go back to him. (deep sigh) Shenn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, hmm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I propose a counter-offer. I just don't feel comfortable offering Vasselheim; I don't think that we could necessarily deliver, and we, honestly, have a lot to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All I'm asking is an introduction to a handful of key figures in the city, no more than that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I will not promise that now. What I can promise right now is some access to materials from Whitestone, which-- and I show him my gun hilt, which is embedded with the gems. I can see what's still lying around, and we can make a deal. I can also promise that for the reconstruction, once this has been dealt with, which is in everybody's best interest, until such time as there's a functioning government in this city, you will be treated with the respect appropriate of a group of people who are helping keeping the city functional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You act like that hasn't been our treatment for the entirety of this city's existence. You "think your council didn't have dealings with the Clasp for many years before this happened?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course they have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We helped make this city function. All we're offering is this service to other places "that maybe don't have the right guidance to achieve their true greatness. All I ask is an "introduction. Beyond these other. Far after the fact; don't even need to worry about it now. Who's "to say what changes from now to then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who would we even introduce you to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't even know anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we do. We know some high-ranking clerics. We know the Slayer's Take. We met a bunch of people up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In a zealot city? You want to go to a cleric and be like, "Hey. Thought you might want "to meet the underground mob boss."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't have to worry about that now. Just a simple handshake, and it's all done."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they prove themselves honorable, if they prove themselves faithful and capable of keeping this city afloat, then we will speak to whomever they wish us to speak to precisely of what they did. No more, no less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If this is an issue of morality, I would like to remind you that, one, we've let you escape "after murdering one of our leaders, only upon learning that he himself was an immoral "individual."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Also, we went against our word as an organization by letting you take a war criminal "that had already paid his way out of the city."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And for that, we are grateful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we gave you something very powerful in exchange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you got to keep that man's money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was business, but business that was persuaded by the actions of good people, and "bringing justice. We want society to thrive."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm willing to kick this ball down the field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Not wasting any more time, shall we make this a fine, healthy city once again?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This feels a fair deal to me, and it means that we can leave knowing that the city will, in fact, still have a populace while we're gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You seem used to selling your soul, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is the job of ruling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we come back and learn that you have made a deal with the dragons, you'll be the first to die, not them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I would only hope that would be the case. I wouldn't be caught dead dealing with such "a selfish entity."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, then let's do this. Keyleth, shake the man's hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got nice soft hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It should be Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not the worst deal I've ever heard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just don't know that yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have things to do."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have met the devil. That's not him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, you make me so nervous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't all day. My arm grows weary with impatience."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like me to sing to give you some extra strength for that arm?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, I will make the deal if you're not up to it, but I want your blessing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what? Keep your deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Attaboy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to leave the city abandoned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With no one to protect it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are not abandoning it. We already discussed it. There's more than one way to cut through this knot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think you're going to let this city fall, anyway. If this city dies, you've nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If the parasite hasn't a host to feed on, the parasite dies. No, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy? I'm sorry, but I think our methods of being rulers might differ. I don't think I need to sell myself for the greater good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Unfortunate as it is. Step forward."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a whisper?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps really close to you, and he takes you by the shoulders and turns you around to face away from him. Do you resist?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to roll out of his hands forward to my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll do as we do. You do as you. Now be gone." And he turns around, flicks his cloak, and steps back into the group. The rest of them keep their hands on their belts and wait for you to leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look at Garthok and say, "Even you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Garthok actually gives you a very stern look and pulls his blade an inch from the side of his scabbard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wouldn't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you can see 25 more Clasp members step out. Even wounded ones as they are, all stepping up and gathering. There are now 35 to 40 of them starting to form out of the shadows, forming a semicircle around you entirely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do it, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go. Come on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A fellow can't smile every once in a while?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just back up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take a bow, and I turn my back to them and walk out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do not turn my back. I walk backwards the entire way out, with an arrow notched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay next to Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say, party on, Garthok. And then we leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth? Darling? Could you maybe make a wall of stone and close off this tunnel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I back out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I end with, hopefully, you will realize there is a far greater enemy at hand than the personal squabbles between us small people. And I also step away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Spireling's not even in view at this point. He's disappeared amongst the rest of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure he can hear me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. As you guys exit and find your way back up to the surface, as the last of you makes it outside of the entranceway, you immediately start hearing this slamming and breaking of stone from underneath you, and you gather pretty rapidly that this entrance is being entirely removed for possible entry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to point out, since you had such noble intentions towards my position on things, this is your ego at work here. I may be many things, and I may be a deal-maker, but I never forget that when I rule, I rule these people, as well. I'm not better than them. And you may think you're better than them, but this is what it creates. It creates enemies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Percy. The difference is, I don't think I'm better than them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They certainly think you do, and they are not pleased.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This mark. Is it magic? Can they trace you through this mark?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't answer. I walk over to Keyleth. Can you still do the thing with your hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (fire noise) That thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rip my shirt down. I want you to burn it away. Now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex, do you have an arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hand it to him. Put this in between your teeth. (sizzling noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sizzling noise) Searing white pain through the back of your eyes, Vax, as Keyleth presses her palm into the center of your shoulder blades. You can hear the sizzling and cracking of skin, and smell the burning of Vax's flesh in the air in this cellar. Make a constitution check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. You break through the arrow with your grip, and actually give out a very loud, painful scream out of reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Similar to when you hit me in my arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. A moment passes. Keyleth, you pull your hand back, and where the Clasp symbol once was, there is a hand mark burned into the back of the shoulders.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill her now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you guys like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was a bust.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could have gone so much better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, I think you made the right call, and I don't think very often.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or very well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we could have gotten out of there with at least the hintings of an alliance, as opposed to just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Straight up--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bitter enemies. This was a disaster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes you have to walk away from a bad deal to find a good one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a thing. Where did-- you didn't read that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got what you were saying, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When it rains, the sun is shining.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's deep, Grog. I like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stew on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already did it. Too late! I fucking touched you, fucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that take the scar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just takes the pain away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not as graphic as it would have been, had it been left to heal on its own, but it does muddle the Clasp symbol somewhat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shall we go back to our keep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could just kill them all now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's hundreds of them, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (splutters) No, we can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw, like, 40 or 50.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there were another 160 in the rafters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would do no good. Who would be bringing food into the city in the first place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're going to go on doing the same thing they would have done with us or without us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're doing it without us, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Percy, do you honestly think that after all of this was done-- do you want to be beholden to those people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't believe they are going to bend the knee to Thordak. I don't believe it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not going to, no. Of course not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that was all I, personally, was worried about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanted people on the inside keeping us informed, and we just lost a very powerful spy network.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the only people on the inside right now have scales.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody needs something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go back to the keep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are not going to bother. We're going to go and we're going to find a way of killing these things, and we're going to hope for the best in this city. That's what we're going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are heading back, I need stealth checks from everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth check. Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then what's the point of anybody rolling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a plus ten? 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys push southward through the city, finding your way. At this point, the sun has set. Night has come in, and occasionally you hear the flapping of leathery wings overhead as a number of sentry groups of wyvern riders go tearing through the city. At one point, you hear a similar (raspy cry) sound, and you hear other ones begin rising up off the rooftops, heading in your direction, Keyleth. What do you guys do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The minute we see that, I'm going to push her against the wall, and I'm going to Minor Illusion a shadow right over her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a new stealth check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) It's a natural one on their end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As long as you didn't roll a natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I didn't, I rolled an eight, plus a seven, plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day you're going to stop being afraid of me, by the way, and I hope that day comes soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go to the keep, do you want to swing by the place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The place with the airships.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no "swinging by," that's a caper. That's an entire thing, that if we're going to do--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to go there and look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The showroom is fucked. It's broken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is one of those things that we're going to have to get everybody on board before we even start talking about it, so probably a good night's sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to sleep. We need to get up in the morning--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really on board with the airship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we need to go to Vasselheim or Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't need an airship to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Westruun. All those cities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we get there can we check in on Gilmore and the queen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. And as you return to the keep, Pike has been taking care of the rest of the individuals, and she's been seeing to Gilmore's side. Gilmore is fast asleep, dealing with the tail end of a fever that has broken, after the healing from the day before. Earlier in the day, I should say. It also appears that Salda and the children have been in and out, keeping an eye as well. Pike, as you enter, looks up to you with a smile, and says, "He'll be all right. He's going to pull through."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make sure he's okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he unconscious still, or just sleeping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is asleep, currently, yeah. "He's been conscious throughout the day while you were gone, "but he's got to rest a bit more. He's still had a rough few days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's dead on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just needs headphones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just need headphones, and to brush against the mic occasionally. Especially during really really impactful story moments.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "What? What?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys find yourselves resting for the evening. You take to a night's sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You going to sleep, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you got to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you don't sleep you're going to start getting levels of exhaustion for the next day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone, you can get half of your hit dice back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the sun goes down? It's been down and everyone's going to their rooms? I go to Keyleth's door and knock on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I open the door. Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi. I don't want to be alone tonight. Do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't been wanting to be alone most nights. And I let him in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, we--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bow-chicka-wow-wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jump forward to the next morning--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we can all fit on that ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, next morning, you all wake up; full hit points, get back half of your max hit dice that you spent. All your spells back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give Scanlan the Hat of Disguise back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You sure you don't need it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, fuck 'em.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take his face and I push him down on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have a plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose our plan is the Slayer's Take next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get there? Wait, we have to get rid of all the 'fugees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We need to go to Whitestone, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, here's the question is do we want to head towards Vasselheim from Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we'll all go. We'll take the last of the-- I can't believe I'm going to say this-- the last of the 'fugees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Ooh, la la la.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. All of our guards, and our servants, as well. I don't want to leave everyone here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're abandoning the keep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what else to do. If dragons attack, our five guards aren't going to be able to do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One dragon crashed in the roof of the building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Accidentally smushed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are the cook and the maid going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make it breakfast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jarett's pretty badass, but I don't think he can handle that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragons get hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we come back, our keep will be gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll be able to build it back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll match the rest of the city, Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival's the lord of Whitestone. He's got a castle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We find a new keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But my room is just the way I want it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure that some lucky dragon's going to come and shit in your bed. It'll be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, if we're going to leave the keep, I'll need a moment in my room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't need to be here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It takes a good month to bathe a room in that much self-loathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look like you're glowing this morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ridiculous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never seen you quite so chipper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's gather what we need, make sure that Gilmore is ready to move, as well. We'll bring everybody through to Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we should go tell the guards that they probably will have to leave, if they want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that they can come work in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't want to force them to, but of course they're welcome to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you go ask the guards? I'll go talk to the kitchen staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know who she's going to talk to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the captain of the guards, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the sake of brevity, you speak with the rest of the keep's staff, including the guards as well. Jarett for the most part is like, "As long as I'm still getting paid, we're more "than happy to go where you need us to be. If it's further away from dragons, I am okay with that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you need your tools?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can pack up my kit, and I've also technically got a reasonable workshop back in Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you gather your materials, you prepare at the tree in the center of the keep, you say your goodbyes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go out there, I go to my room, I take a dump on my bed--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've used it at the temple of Sarenrae--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's not a potion. Just a straight-up poo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a straight-up poo? Okay. Marking your territory. I respect that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hang a note on the gate of the keep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shitting on your own bed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want anyone else to use it. And with a butter knife, I put a note on the gate to the keep that says, "If Kaylie comes, go to Whitestone. P.S. If my painting is delivered, "please forward to Scanlan Shorthalt, care of Whitestone."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Mind the poo."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I leave a note for Allura, and tell her we've headed to Whitestone, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't say Whitestone. I say, "the place where we sent you originally," so she knows where it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Notes are placed. Spell is prepared?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've packed everything that could possibly be used to make anything dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all gather in the center of the temple of Sarenrae. Keyleth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet, Keyleth!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's wrong? Are you ready, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's the first time we've had a home in forever, and we're leaving it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you make it disappear, or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go. It's nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can put Hallucinatory Terrain over it, that'll last a bit, but not long enough to make it worthwhile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've done it once before. We can do it again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will be built back better than before. That's what we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The portal opens outside of the tree, and all of the refugees start rushing through. You guys give chase, following over to the opposite side, where Whitestone waits. You all emerge from the Sun Tree in the center of the familiar town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking cold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've arrived back in Whitestone. So, do you guys want to wait here for the day, and then make your way to Vasselheim?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to talk to anybody here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to set up to make sure that the queen and her children are taken in at the castle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I imagine you'll fill your sister in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will. I'll fill my sister in on how they're to be taken care of. Make sure that Gilmore is taken care of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may want to stock up on potions and stuff before we leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, buy as much as we can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is, but you guys have cleaned it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Buy stuff in Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their main providers have been killed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think that with the time that's passed, Cassandra has found any of the belongings of the Briarwoods? They were pretty snazzy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can ask about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you have a question?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to kill some dragons, and we are out of everything. You've been here a while. Have you found anything of the Briarwoods? Any store of treasure or potion or anything of use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the personal effects you all retrieved when they were defeated. What remnants "of income or gold which they'd kept was put in with the rest of the Whitestone treasury when they "took over."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not so much interested in gold as in means of protection or healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They weren't really specialized in healing, I'm afraid, and what bits of protection they had, "you've already taken. But if gold is what you need, we can probably spare you some."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm not going to say no to the gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously, we'll sieve the coffer a little bit because we're going to need it for the mission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So very generous of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, let's re-employ our castle guards as the Emon royal guards in the meantime, and they can serve the queen and her children.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That can be very easily presented. Oh, here we are!" There's a small chest with a lid that she hands it over to you. Actually, puts it out and your hands are already out. "All right. 2,000 gold "from our coffers. It's not much, but we have to keep the city running."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a small amount of the green gem, if that would be possible, that's left over from the mining operation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of the glass?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of the glass. If possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, certainly."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I'm working on something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." It takes a few minutes for that to be retrieved from down south of the tomb in the mausoleum, but nevertheless, you get four half-dollar-sized pieces of residuum glass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have quite a bit of individuals to find homes for, and get them running."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gilmore will be of great help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, as you've told me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) I'm sorry to drop this all on you, and I'm thankful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm thankful that we even have an opportunity to offer aid to somebody. That's "thanks to you, so it's nothing on us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will not be the end of it, sadly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, good luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be off in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we getting to Vasselheim?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can teleport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, teleport, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just pop on over, yeah. We sleep for the night, and then we go over to Vasselheim the next day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's have dinner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hang out in Whitestone for the day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to work on that little project.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whitestone and chill.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The thing I was trying to attach to my gun but wasn't working, I'm going to try to attach it to my boot instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can draw you a sketch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. While the rest of you guys are attempting to rest, I need you to make a tinker tools check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tinker tools. This goes in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. You've affixed it to your boot. We'll see if it works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I've got one working piece? I know each individual build, I have to build the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The nubbin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The actual device itself has to be built for individual usage; it's not auto. I'm going to try and build one and see how it goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So total cost for the materials on that will put you at about 300 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 300 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working on something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's your city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you borrowing 300 of your gold from the money you loaned to Vex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since the day I've met her, I've given her every bloody dime I've made. So, yes. I no longer even think about it anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I love you for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's just happier that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) "She's just happier that way."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You find an evening's rest. The next morning comes uneventfully. You find yourselves refreshed. I'd say at this point, you're all at full hit dice after two nights of rest; you're fine. So, on to Whitestone, Keyleth?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. You're in Whitestone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were just here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The largest you've seen in Vasselheim would probably have been on the outskirts of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where we fought the hydra, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We camped out in a few trees outside of Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to stop outside the city or within the city, is the question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever's closest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No magic in the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No magic in the city, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No arcane magic. Divine magic is a different thing. There's plenty of divine magic within the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is there a teleportation circle? Do we have one in Whitestone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There wasn't a teleportation circle to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no sigils to Vasselheim. Part of their defense process is preventing any secret intrusion in that regard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll teleport to the outside of the city and perhaps sleep at the temple of Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the Abundant Terrace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We always have rooms at Slayer's Take, remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do always have rooms at Slayer's Take.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the Abundant Terrace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is where primarily most of the farming, food--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you know there are a number of orchards and things that are kept in that vicinity. If you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right outside the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's within the city. It's one of the five quarters. I won't say quarters. It's one of the five areas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quarters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Gilmore staying here in Whitestone? Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unless you want to try and bring him with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it makes sense to leave him here, right? Where do you want to stay, Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You're approaching Gilmore. He goes, "To be perfectly honest, I'm not quite "feeling 100%, and let's just say I'm not a huge fan of the zealot type."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasselheim doesn't really jangle my dingles."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got a whole bookstore devoted to you here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is true."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would appreciate your help in restarting the economy of Whitestone, to be fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) I was so close to opening. I started from "nothing! I can do it again. (coughs) Good luck, you all."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to a tree outside of the city?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's in the farming district in the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the actual city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all emerge in the center of this orchard, you can see one of the nearby workers who's tilling the land looks over. "Hey! What are you doing here? You're not supposed to be in the "middle of the orchard!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slayer's Take business. We'll keep moving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were just leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fine! Just get out."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all I can say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Manticore?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just cruel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry. We took care of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (weakly) "Thanks." He starts looking nervously over his shoulders as he goes back to his work. Eventually, you guys step outside of the Terrace, finding your way to the Quadroads, which is the central network that the four main portions of Vasselheim attach to. This is the Erathis-based center of the town. You have before you, to remind you, at the very northern part of the town is the extremely tall, pointed mountain known as Heaven's Stair. Attached to that mountain on one side is the Silver Talon's Reach. That is the main temple to Bahamut. To the left of it, against the mountain, not actually into it, is the Braving Grounds. This is the area that is geared towards Kord, the deity of war, where you had previously had a conversation with the Dawn Master, the Earthbreaker Groon. There's the Platinum Sanctuary in the Silver Talon's Reach, which is where the Highbearer Vord, the Silver-Touched, the high priest of Bahamut is. You also just left the Abundant Terrace, and there is the Quadroads, which is where the Slayer's Take currently is. And there is the Duskmeadow, which is the Raven Queen's domain. Where do you guys want to go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remind me, what was the Duskmeadow, again? Was that where we chased the rakshasa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is where the Amaranthine Oubliette resides, which is the prison of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the name of the section of the city that has the Slayer's Take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the Quadroads, the Erathis, deity of civilization.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy I beat in the crucible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That ripped, chiseled old man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy who beat you twice?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And nobody beat me twice. He got lucky once, get it straight. I want to go talk to him because maybe we need some more fighters and strong folks and I think he might know where they might be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should talk to the Slayer's Take, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should get our rooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go post up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have things to put down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And also only about a day's travel from Pyrah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that? Pyrah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's left of it. That will be a trip that will be necessary soon, but not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hit the Slayer's Take first, or where are you heading?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Slayer's Take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to let them know we're here and we need some rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opening the front door, you can see within the main foyer area, there is the dark iron chandeliers that run across the entire length of the moot hall, if you will. Across the front area, you find the clerk desk. Sitting behind it, a familiar red-haired, tousled, chin-bearded, scarred-up tiny man with his feet up on the desk, falling asleep in his chair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ta-da!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is this craziness? (laughs) Ah! It's been some time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. Hello."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your business? What are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dragons? Have you heard about anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the most recent, but nothing beyond that, "really, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to need rooms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're probably going to need to speak to your lady lord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your wife.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, your wife, but I'm talking about the boss, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's his wife.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Higher still: the sphinx.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should be back in the next day or so."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For now, we need a place to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you're always welcome here. This is your home away from home, so please, take a load "off. Pick a room. It's up to you. It's good to see you all so healthy!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Healthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Mertin. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. So glad to hear."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only reason I remember that is it sounds like merkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Zahra around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's actually currently out with Vanessa on a hunt, as we speak."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perhaps we could see her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, we're tired. We've been hopping all over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me, too. I was sleeping when you came in. I don't mind if I get back to that."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry. Any room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it's somebody else's room, they'll let you know, so please, take your time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, settle in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm settling in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess we all settle in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a number of empty rooms. Doesn't look like there's a lot of individuals around. As you walk down one of the hallways, though, you do see there is a card table, and the two individuals in there, you see a very scarred, burly, and frustrated dwarf who's throwing down cards on a table. Black, long series of beards, and his hair over his beard. You see Thorbir is sitting there at the card table with another man wearing really beautiful, ornate armor that is well-polished; very short, dirty blond hair, who is apparently owning him at cards, going, (chuckles) "You've "terrible luck, friend. I'm sorry to hear this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Aldor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Aldor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I guess it's about time you all showed up. I'm going to get a drink." And he gets up, away from the table, and walks away from the rest of you, with a half-hearted "hi," but he's in a huffy mood and walks off. Aldor takes his winnings and scoops the change into a pouch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aldor, Aldor, Aldor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's Lyra? Have you seen her? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why? Have you seen her?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in a while, but we thought you guys were engaged to be married. No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the last we heard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches forward and grabs your shirt and pulls you in. "Where did you hear that?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not from a reliable source, I promise you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very sketchy source.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. You haven't seen her, have you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's still a member of the Slayer's Take, of course, though. Isn't she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I assume. I just run if I see her. She's a bit--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! She seems nice to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. You know what, actually, if you want to do me a favor. I mean, she's a nice girl, "probably pretty easy if you ask her. Why don't you take her off my hands and go on a date? Take her "out for dinner. Distract her."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You saw her first. I'm a man of honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. No. I should go." He grabs his stuff and leaves in a huff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to see him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's looking well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's weird being back, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I guess we should ask them all if they want to come with us to fight a dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do we do that now, or do we do that in the morning?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: In the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels like we were just running screaming from dragons in the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We traveled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll sleep on it. We'll talk to Nessa in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll get up in the morning, we'll take some of that gold, we'll put it to good use, we'll wait until Nessa gets back, and then we'll carve out a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds just fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kord's strength to us all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if Kashaw is still here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably, he works here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kashaw. That was the one that they went on a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Right, Keyleth? The guy that kissed you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammers)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Brooding. Handsome. He was so troubled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was very handsome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we should probably go to sleep, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's morning, still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's maybe 10:00am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a nap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's across the world, so it's technically earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it's jet lag. It's teleport lag. It gets to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Nessa and Zahra have seen him. We could find out. We could use another healer, always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 6:30, 7:00 in the morning in Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, speaking of clerics, do you want to check in with your temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike has actually stayed back in Whitestone to help the refugees.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. She didn't even come to Vasselheim?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but she did say that she's going to keep an eye, best she can, through Sarenrae. When she can pop in, she'll try and see if she can project her form, going forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's led by her conscience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We didn't think to leave her a stone, did we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, you could have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would we have done that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have definitely suggested leaving her with one of the stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we probably should leave the stone with her so she can pop in with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll say that she does that. She keeps a gatestone with her, just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trinket stays in Emon, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket's going to guard the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is right here, right now! He has been quiet, because he's really well-behaved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's been practicing his stealth. (bear grunts)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So stealthy, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you've set up your rooms, your stuff about you. You have a full day before seemingly anyone from the Slayer's Take is going to come back. Where do you want to head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Individual?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Individuals? Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shit, can we buy potions in this city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit! You can't, can you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid to start anything. It's 11:00.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it's late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Then we will end it there this evening. I just wanted to get an idea of where you guys were going for next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I plan to go see Earthbreaker Groon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to wait and talk to Zahra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may want to have a conversation at the temple of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zahra sounds fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? But I do want to buy potions, as well, and stock up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing. I'd probably tag along with Percival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Old punchy man? You don't want to come with?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, I'll come watch you if you're going to have a fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm going to have a conversation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right. I do want to see Old Punchy Man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can do both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some hand-to-hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch you lose again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not fighting him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Vax and Scanlan are going with Grog to the Trial Forge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stock up on a bunch of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll do some shopping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go to the temple of the Raven Queen. I also want to talk to our mapmaker friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to the Raven's Crest. Got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. We'll pick it up next week at that point, guys. Awesome. Well done, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We abandoned Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we did, and it's sad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very sad. We abandoned Emon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't help it from there. We have to go somewhere else in order to come back to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Greyskull Keep is going to be an ancient dragon's kitty litter box.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm allergic to cats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you love it, you have to--

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Let it go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like our first hometown, or our elven town?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, do you know who says, "if you love it, you have to let it go?" The one who got dumped, that's who! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's horrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you are. I'm a terrible person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be fun, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See you in Arizona!
